item.description:
Are you depressed? Experiencing anxiety? Having unexplainable frustrations? Are you suffering or watching someone close to you struggle with a mental “illness?”

 

Mental Illness is usually approached from the standpoint of medicate and sedate as opposed to exploring the spiritual changes that are being experienced within a person. Working with these emotions and “awakened” spiritual emergence can help you and the ones you love find some peace and answers to questions that have been overlooked or ignored. Join Cindi Lane as she explores with you the myths behind mental illness and learn what you can do to stay in tune and in touch with yourself and the people you love and support.   

 

This introduction will be followed up with a weekly support group to look further into the possibities of helping loved ones that are in need of less medication and more loving support due to spirtual awakening.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Introduction toThe Myth of Mental Illness with Cindi Lane
